Super Mario Maker 1 archive

Archive all courses and metadata uploaded to Super Mario Maker 1

About the project

Python script used to archive all the courses currently uploaded to Super Mario Maker 1. Connects to the game servers using a custom client to scrape all the data. Made at the request of Archive Team to preserve the content of the game
